page.title: 01EFFINGHAM AND HORSLEY
page.content: The Effingham and Horsley areas are {heavily wooded commuter villages serving London, Guildford and North East Surrey. Both have thriving communities with a good mix of age groups. However due to the high cost of{housing}this is not an area where young people can settle. There are excellent road and{rail} {links}with London and the South Coast.The area has recently been made even more accessible with the opening of the{M25.}This may well have serious implications , some people are already leaving the area because it is becoming too busy. As this is a rural area there are few facilities. Most people travel to Guildford or Leatherhead for shopping entertainment and leisure facilities.{
